title: URL Parser
description: Use this free online URL parser to break any URL into protocol, host, path, hash, and query parameters instantly.
helper: Paste a full URL or a domain; we'll add https:// if missing.
empty: Enter a URL to see the parsed result.

openGraph.title: URL Parser
openGraph.description: Free URL parsing tool for inspecting protocol, domain, port, path, and query parameters. Validate tracking links, debug redirects, and review SEO-friendly URL structures in seconds.
